ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(Send_Timeline_Receipt_of_Paperwork__c))&& ISBLANK(Timeline_Sent_by_Rep__c), ISBLANK( Suggested_Blackout_Date__c)|| ISBLANK( Estimated_Week_of_Liquidation__c )|| ISPICKVAL(SDBA_Instructions_Included__c,"" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Following fields are required "Suggested Blackout Date", "Estimated Week of Liquidation", and "SDBA Instructions Included" if "Send Timeline/Receipt of Paperwork" has value.
